name: part_003
file: tmp_Airani iofifteen Birthday 2025 3D Live, Have a Nice Trip and Dream #iofiLucidDream [mMDPWutdkDM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Iofi finishes her acoustic guitar performance and talks to the audience about guests and memberships.

subtitles.original: Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes...
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes...

subtitles.original: そう、あのめんげのみんなはもう知ってると思いますけど...
subtitles.english: So, I think everyone in the Menge already knows this...

subtitles.original: あの、ふつうはギターはめんげでしか弾いてないんだけど、
subtitles.english: Um, usually I only play guitar in Menge,

subtitles.original: これがめんげじゃない配信で初めてです。
subtitles.english: but this is the first time in a non-Menge stream.

subtitles.original: え、ちょっと怖いんだけど、
subtitles.english: Eh, I'm a bit nervous,

subtitles.original: まあまあまあ、どうでしたか？
subtitles.english: but well, well, how was it?

subtitles.original: どう？どう？かわいい？かわいい？
subtitles.english: How? How? Cute? Cute?

subtitles.original: いっぱいスクショ撮った？スクショ撮った？
subtitles.english: Did you take lots of screenshots? Screenshots?

subtitles.original: I hope you enjoyed it!
subtitles.english: I hope you enjoyed it!

subtitles.original: And by the way, we still have a lot of more going on.
subtitles.english: And by the way, we still have a lot of more going on.

subtitles.original: So after this there's gonna be a lot and a lot of guests,
subtitles.english: So after this there's gonna be a lot and a lot of guests,

subtitles.original: so please wait for it!
subtitles.english: so please wait for it!

subtitles.original: この後もゲストが盛りだくさんなので、楽しみにしててくださいねー
subtitles.english: There will be many guests after this too, so please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: Don't forget to take a lot of screenshots!
subtitles.english: Don't forget to take a lot of screenshots!

subtitles.original: Kawaii! Lagi? Lucu? Lucu? Lucu? Lucu?
subtitles.english: Cute! Again? Cute? Cute? Cute? Cute?

subtitles.original: ま、ね、時間があればこれもね、
subtitles.english: Well, you know, if there's time,

subtitles.original: またギター弾きたいなと思っております、はい。
subtitles.english: I'd like to play the guitar again, yes.

subtitles.original: あ、おっけー。
subtitles.english: Ah, okay.

subtitles.original: 準備おっけー。
subtitles.english: Prep is okay.

subtitles.original: おっけー、おっけー、おっけー。
subtitles.english: Okay, okay, okay.

subtitles.original: では、ゲストパートにまた会おうねー！
subtitles.english: Then, let's meet again in the guest part!

subtitles.original: Thank you! See you in guest part!
subtitles.english: Thank you! See you in guest part!

subtitles.original: THERE IS A REASON / Lyrics: 岩里祐穂 Music: ヒゲドライバー
subtitles.english: THERE IS A REASON / Lyrics: Yuho Iwasato Music: Hige Driver

subtitles.original: どこから話せばいいんだろう 待ちくたびれても
subtitles.english: Where should I start talking, even if I'm tired of waiting

subtitles.original: 終わりだなんて言わせないから
subtitles.english: Because I won't let you say it's the end

subtitles.original: 書き殴った無意識の衝動を連れて
subtitles.english: Taking along the scribbled unconscious impulses

subtitles.original: 何もかも壊したら不可能を始めればいいんだ
subtitles.english: If you break everything, you just have to start the impossible

subtitles.original: There's a reason that we came across in this world
subtitles.english: There's a reason that we came across in this world

subtitles.original: There's a reason that we call magnetic world
subtitles.english: There's a reason that we call magnetic world

subtitles.original: 響き続け合う 世界はどこへ
subtitles.english: Where is the world that continues to resonate with each other going

subtitles.original: 愛のために泣けるのは 君がそこにいるから
subtitles.english: Being able to cry for the sake of love is because you are there

subtitles.original: 君だけを呼び続けるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll keep calling only you

subtitles.original: 愛のために歌うのは そして共に生きること
subtitles.english: Singing for the sake of love is also about living together

subtitles.original: ずっと 君と
subtitles.english: Forever, with you

subtitles.original: 青色した空となみひとつない鏡のよう…な
subtitles.english: The blue sky and like a mirror without a single wave...

subtitles.original: 海を見てた
subtitles.english: Watching the sea

subtitles.original: どんな場所に立って どんな形になって
subtitles.english: No matter where you stand, no matter what shape you take

subtitles.original: どんな時代に立って
subtitles.english: No matter what era it is,

subtitles.original: 見つけ出すよ より速く 宙吊りにした 運命に逆らって
subtitles.english: I'll find you faster, defying the fate that was put into the air

subtitles.original: There's a reason that we came across in this world
subtitles.english: There's a reason that we came across in this world

subtitles.original: There's a reason that we call magnetic world
subtitles.english: There's a reason that we call magnetic world

subtitles.original: 引き寄せ合う 二人はどこへ
subtitles.english: Where are the two of us, who are drawn to each other, going

subtitles.original: 愛のために進むのは 君がそこにいるから
subtitles.english: Moving forward for the sake of love is because you are there

subtitles.original: 僕だけが君を護るから
subtitles.english: Because only I will protect you

subtitles.original: 愛のために願うのは そして誰も傷つけずに
subtitles.english: Praying for the sake of love, and without hurting anyone

subtitles.original: ずっと 隣で
subtitles.english: Forever, by your side

subtitles.original: 僕らは超えて行く 全ての憎しみを
subtitles.english: We will overcome all the hatred

subtitles.original: 偽物の正義など 捨ててしまえ
subtitles.english: Throw away things like fake justice

subtitles.original: 愛のために泣けるのは 君がそこにいるから
subtitles.english: Being able to cry for the sake of love is because you are there

subtitles.original: We will always...
subtitles.english: We will always...
